p: In a previous report, Arabidopsis GPAT1 was shown to act as an essential factor for tapetum and pollen development [ 31]. In this work, we studied the role of GPAT1 in regulating Arabidopsis plant height. Our results revealed that knockout of GPAT1 increased plant height by activating GA metabolism and signaling, which then stimulated cell wall organization and biogenesis. This study provides evidence on how GPAT-mediated glycerolipid metabolism influences plant height through GA.
